header.topics: Studies, academic research, design, advertising, TV, food, weekend activities, jobs, sport, advice about writing a research project
header.activity: Friends having pizza while chatting and proofreading a research project.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, requesting
